channel.title: gaming on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in gaming on Tobyblog

item.title: Infexxion-34
item.description: Infexxion is an iPhone game based on the old arcade game Attax. My cousin Carl introduced me to it. There was a cabinet in the lobby of a (surely long-since demolished?) movie theater in what is now a rough part of Lafayette, Louisiana. I forget what we were seeing that night. He played â€” I didn’t, as I recall. It had a weird, edgy kind of quality to it, like an Exidy game.

item.title: What the Hell is This Poster For the Sonic the Hedgehog Movie?
item.description: The Sonic the Hedgehog movie comes out this year. Are you hyped, nostalgia boys?! Because if you look at this poster and get hyped, I’m calling the cops. Seriously, who designed this freakish movie poster and why is he/she not in jail/hell?
